name: SEX! At Alexanderplatz
description:
SEX! At Alexanderplatz is a performance and dating game set in hell (Alexanderplatz).

Crank the lever of your dating app, let the slot machine spin, let sparks of fury fly, let lonely hearts die (alone).

This game was made and performed for Fantasia Malware Presents 4.

The game is playable but still in development. A final version should be released by May.

Credits

Game by Jira Duguid, Gabriel Helfenstein and Chloê Langford

Audio Mastering by Isaka

Poster Design by Alpha Rats
